banner:text-1: Appears below the 'piTime' logo in the home page. First line
banner:text-2: Appears below the 'piTime' logo in the home page. Second line
banner:design-button: Appears on the button that redirects the user to the design section.
about:desc-text: First paragraph in the about section.
about:github-text: Second paragraph in the about section.
about:design-button: Appears on the button that redirects the user to the design section.
design-title: The title of the design section.
design:mode-selector:countdown: The title that appears in the mode selection bar, and represents the countdown mode.
design:mode-selector:countup: The title that appears in the mode selection bar, and represents the countup mode.
design:mode-selector:current-time: The title that appears in the mode selection bar, and represents the current time mode.
design:preview:title: Preview panel title. Appears in the italic style.
design:settings:title: Settings panel title.
